name: New Page Comments
author: easetousers

sections.description:
New Page Comments Reduce load time process of comments functionality on your WordPress site. Show comments section in new page or load when user wants to see and user engagement to move other posts also.

At a glance, this plugin adds the following:

  • Administrator can show the comments separate from the post / page
  • Administrator can manage the slug of comment page
  • Its work for all post, page, and custom post types posts

Support
We try our best to provide support on WordPress.org forums. where you can ask us questions and get help about your questions.
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • small bug fixed

0.2

  • Added: Lazy loading for comments
  • Improved: Setting panel
  • Added: option to change text of load comment button
  • Added: user can change the slug of new page

0.1

  • Initial version
